name: NYDailyNews
text:
An ex-con was ordered held without bail in the death of a hero subway operator who helped riders escape a fire on a Harlem train.

The suspect admits starting the blaze with a Bic lighter — but he insists he wasn't responsible for the conductor's death.
https://t.co/3vNXrJeVHQ

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: “I watched two guys die right in front of me."

A raging fire swallowed a Queens apt. building in smoke and flames, killing 3, wounding 4 and leaving residents shaken.

Flames engulfed the building and 2 floors had collapsed as firefighters quickly arrived
https://t.co/VM7GwWcpyh

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: Just a day after a Milwaukee panel selected a new acting police chief, a judge gave ousted Police Chief Alfonso Morales his job back.
https://t.co/oKICNDeQXy

name: NYDailyNews
text:
NYC Comptroller Scott Stringer is getting some heavyweight endorsements for his 2021 mayoral bid.

Rep. Jerrold Nadler is one of several Manhattan elected officials announcing their support for Stringer.
https://t.co/IBa7a8efKb

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The crime was dumb — but this accused car thief had no trouble getting first aid.

The genius pepper-sprayed a woman, stole her car and then crashed it into the back of an unoccupied FDNY ambulance, cops said.
https://t.co/qIfCOlkk7f

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @snydenydn: “If a little Hillbilly singer like my big sister Dolly can invest in the vaccine then why the hell can’t some of you old moldy politicians pitch in a few million yourselves?”

Stella Parton lashed out at politicians over the vaccine rollout.
https://t.co/NEuEVSnxZS
